column4: Friendly, efficient service and an excellent steak. Quiet if you avoid the pre-theatre rush. Good wines by the glass.
Always excellent Nice people Nice surroundings Excellent atmosphere for deep conversations without unnecessary interruptions
this was our first time we have been to this steakhouse the food is excellent and so are the staff,i would recomend this steakhouse to anyone.
This for us was the best meal we had in New York. Excellent service and the food was cooked to perfection.

column3: Great steak in Hells Kitchen area of New York
column4: Great food in lovely local restaurant. The steak was superb and service was excellent all topped of with a decent bottle of wine!
Food was excellent, but the waiters weren’t very friendly. Which was a shame. Like I said, food was fantastic. Service not so much. Maybe he wasn’t happy with his 20% tip
Great food. We had the large cut of the filet, and shared it with two side orders of scampi shrimp. Great bar, and nice break, small, comfy, romantic space. We will return.
Very tasty food. Tender meat with tasty mash and lovely creamed spinach. Nice and service minded waiter. Recommended

The service was ok. The staff was not unpleasant, but they were definitely not helpful. You don't feel welcome at all. The food was awful. The burger meat was dry and tasteless. The steak was rubbery as sole.

On a trip to NYC wanted a good steak dinner - found this place; great neighborhood feel, with superb steaks. We tried NY Strip which was perfect and thoroughly enjoyed our meals. Highly recommend. Will be back.
..... and cozy place with good food and nice servants. Price is okay and the menu was fine. Very close to hotel YOTEL

Nice decor and the place seems very relaxed. The service was good and i was very impressed with my awesome medium rare steak. Really good, one of the best i have ever had. The whole family enjoyed their food too. Nice, will be going back!
We had a New York Strip steak and lamb chop and two sides. The food was fast and good. The service nice. However, there was not that extra thing that makes you wow.
We had steak and orange duck with mushroom risotto, it was delicious. Service was very nice and timely. This was our 3rd time coming here and we still getting impressed

Final night in New York wanted great steak found West Side Steakhouse fantastic steak 3 fillet mignon 1rib eye 1 New York Strip all cooked to perfection great sides, lovely atmosphere and perfect service from Rich. We’ll be back next time in NYC thank you
Excellent steak in a casual setting; easily one of the best steaks I’ve had. Prices were reasonable for the quality.

This place is amazing. The steak was cooked perfect. The staff were great,friendly and knowledgeable. Everything was so good. Prosecco was so nice. Price was great! Will definitely come back when I'm next here

column3: Very good food - informal og plesant atmosphere
column4: One of the best and most tender steaks I ever had. Informal and nice atmosphere. The vine recimmened was a perfect match to the meal.

column3: Excellent food & atmosphere at less than top prices
column4: This was a great find. Steaks were excellent but reasonably priced. Atmosphere not stuffy, was casual and comfortable. Server Craig excellent was well. Strip steaks cooked perfectly, mashed potatoes & caesar great as well.
Great ambience, the steak was exquisite and cooked perfectly as ordered. The sides complemented the steak and the service was 5 star.
Best experience ever in a restaurant. The service was impeccable, the food incredible. Everyone was attentive to our every need. Our family had an enjoyable evening. Our expectations were exceeded.

Didn’t see the reviews but saw it when passed by, defiantly worth booking as it gets busy, Food is fresh and beautifully cooked, including a large diverse selection of ales and beers. Staff are friendly and accommodating,Well worth the visit
Was not busy which I prefer, perfect portions. We ordered a porterhouse for two and it was delicious.
I can say that this is a very good choice for dinner in New York! Great steaks and very fast service. The waiters are very kind and the prices are affordable.My recommendations for this restaurant.
A super evening with very prompt service and lovely tasty food. We both ate the Filet Mignon and had some sides. All superbly cooked and delicious. Would highly recommend this steakhouse.
A small but popular place in Hells Kitchen . The steaks were cooked to perfection and well priced , but sides were extra. The wine was good quality , and the service efficient.
Great steak, nice surroundings and atmosphere. Service good. Only downfall, no draft beer available. $12 for a bottle of Bud a little over the top
Excellent meal with food cooked to perfection. Our waiter, Wade, was attentive, welcoming and knowledgeable. Would definitely recommend.
We turned up without a booking but had a table within minutes. It’s not a massive restaurant so booking worthwhile. The steak was amazing cooked perfectly. Definitely worth a visit.
We went here on our last night in New York. Wade was funny and attentive, and our meals were fantastic. Steak, salmon and pasta were all cooked to perfection and delicious!
Great steaks, perfectly cooked, service was excellent too, couldn't leave New York without sampling a proper steak, wasn't disappointed

We made a reservation here mostly for convenience because we were staying in the hotel across the street. What a great find it was!!! Dinner was excellent as was the staff! I would definitely recommend it and will certainly go back! Delicious!
Really nice meal and great service. Fabulous wine advice matching the food perfectly. Lovely highlight of our trip to NYC. Not noisy as many places can be. No phone intrusions either.
Wonderful staff. Great steak. It was an absolutely wonderful dining experience. It seems everyone else felt the same way tonight. Recommended.
Simply straight forward delicious food. The owner was a complete gentleman. Chocolate Martini..... YUM!!
The food was really good, and the service was Quick. We Got the duck in orange sauce, it was really tasty especilly the mash. Good place with fair prices

We had a delightful evening at the West Side Steakhouse. The food was delicious especially the melt in your mouth filet mignon! Our waiter Wade was great which added to our enjoyment. I would highly recommend this restaurant.
Good food and service. Good location for getting to theater before or after dinner. Very small bar. Fair prices for NYC.
The Fillet steak was perfectly cooked. Yes, it is more expensive than other places but the quality is well worth paying for. Thoroughly recommended. Service was excellent too. Thoroughly recommended.
I come back after two years. The staff was great as the last time, very nice and polite. The steak was succulent. Very very good! Give it a chance!
Great service, great food and low key ambience. Not overly expensive for the quality. House wine very nice as well !

We had a fantastic time ! The place is cosy and the food was great, tasty and the portion were generous. Our waiter was funny and attentive, without being overwhelming. All in all I would recommend this restaurant.
Pricey but what isn’t in NY? Steak was good, though not exceptional. Service good. A little off the main drag so a quieter option.
Nice restaurant with nice meals. They have nice beers to choose also. I would go back anytime. Thank you.
Server couldve cared less. Setting/ambiance not great. Food not great. Sub par. One could do much better.
Extraordinary food, in particular meet and desserts. Nice piace. Staff is very friendly. I’ll come back for sure!

We booked in advance having seen the good reviews. The table was prepared and ready for us. The food was excellent. Everyone had steak and each was cooked to their preference and serve hot. Nice selection of sides. The staff very attentive, friendly and professional.

column3: Excellent Food with Quietly Efficient Service
column4: Our Filet Mignon was excellent and cooked as requested. The service was all that you could wish for being friendly, relaxed but extremely efficient. In our experience a difficult combination to achieve.

A super evening at this excellent steakhouse. The steaks were cooked to perfection, along with the side dishes. Very pleasant and professional service with a relaxed ambience in the restaurant. Unpretentious, well priced and a great meal. RECOMMENDED unreservedly.
Called in of the street, got a table and had a first class sirloin, plain, simple but great, not that expensive either
We liked the steak very much. Perfectly done. The restaraunt had atmosphere and the service was friendly. We will definitely come back.
Great food but extremely expensive even for NYC. One Filet + sides, one salad + shrimps, 2 glasses of wine: 169$ I’m not Rockefeller :) First and last time!

Close to Times Square, this cosy little restaurant was a hit! The steak was delicious as were the sauces and sides. Bill was reasonable and the staff were attentive and friendly. Felt like a local in this little place.
Lot of looking around at reviews went this evening had the New York strip steak & Sauteed Brest of Chicken in Caper Lemon Wine Sauce absolutely lovely worth every penny.
Great food, perfectly cooked steaks all round Lovely fries Excellent beer selection to boot Organised friendly staff snd prompt food. Incredibly they also do takeout and delivery.
The food and service is incredible and you can't beat the location. It is extremely similar to Peter Lugers!
we were a large party - everyone loved their entree, except my pork chops were dry / over cooked. Great drinks - people enjoyed their steaks & seafood. I'd order steak next time
Went for dinner for two - nice table, nice service, very good food. Had the ribs which I recommend - better half enjoyed a NY Strip. Recommend.
What an amazing meal! We had filets and it was one of the best cuts of meats I have ever had! Highly recommend!

column3: Great ham but too fast service!!
column4: Super delicious meat, well cooked and served. About service: too fast, like they would u get away. I will try again
It’s really nice place. Great steaks, wonderful wine, nice side dishes etc. You can be sure you’ll have a nice evening here.
One of these typical small sized restaurants in NY, and with a care and atmosphere that makes you feel at home. Not too fancy, enough variety to be interesting, and decent pricing.

It was good restaurant zooming around on type of steak cooking Following a traditional method 🍳 , Other places have gone offering better qualities than meat I think it's average also nothing new on this place
Came here on business. Ordered the New York strip with blue cheese crumbles. Steak was cooked to perfection. All around fantastic meal.
3 blocks from Times Square, worth the effort to get away from the chain restaurants. Highly recommended. Steak & chips good. We enjoyed blue cheese topping, and the pepper sauce.
good for Steak Lovers as well as fish (salmon), reasonable Prices, if you come early enough low waiting time, relative simple furnishing but great service
Experienced poor service here. Incorrect meals delivered to party members, very surly waitress with no personality.

column3: Quaint little place with BIG taste!
column4: We ate here before going to the Broadway show, Anastasia. We were seated quickly, served quickly, and food was wonderful. We had the crab cakes, the bacon wrapped scallops and the three cheese mac. I will eat here again when I visit NYC!

The restaurant is not much to look at from the outside but the food is very good. We had several appetizers, main dishes(including steak) and sides and all were delicious! More reasonably priced than the traditional, upscale steakhouses. Great location on the West Side.
Unexpected pleasure - The Westside Steak House (I've been there twice) is a real find. The food and service is excellent, as is the ambiance.A great place a bit off the beaten path.
The Heart Attack Burger was killing us! Super quality meat, the biggest and best fries we ever had! 5 thumbs up! Also very kind service. Great atmosphere
Conveniently located on 10th avenue... not far from Times Square Nice indoor/ outdoor dining area Great selection of meat... spare ribs are fingers licking good !

So we appreciated our early dinner at this restaurant and were delighted by the taste of food especially the meat. Though I would say it's pricy and I was surprised that meat didn't come with side dish. We had to order it separately.
Went here on a trip advisor recommendation and glad we did Food was excellent and service top class - staff really friendly Good value for money and definitely recommend for families
This was our second visit to this restaurant. We did reservation this time because it gets busy. Good is great, good choice of wine and beer. They have a small patio, but inside is very cozy.
Ate at west Side steakhouse . Good value for New York City, My wife and I had NY strip it was very good , good service, It was Saturday night busy and loud, But well worth the trip.
I had the New York steak cooked to a perfect medium rare. Grilled asparagus and garlic mashed potatoes. Really loved the steak and asparagus. For a steak dinner in NYC the price was decent.
Went an early dinner end of May 2017: me and my son had that big Porterhouse "King of Steak" and my husband had a T Bone. We all enjoyed the size and the taste. Great dinner!

This restaurant is very busy, but still they manage to be effective. We had a warm welcome, and the waiters made us feel comfortable. We ate chicken and steak and they were perfectly prepared. Nice place, but like EVERYTHING in NY – Expensive.

We stumbled across this restaurant looking for lunch after a trip on Circle Line cruises. I had an excellent burger my wife had a chicken club sandwich both very good. Service was very good, lovely setting, they had some very good value lunch specials.
Great steak and sides! We looked for a medium priced steak place, and found this one. Recommendations!
Lovely little steakhouse. Food was outstanding, service was great. A wonderful night, would absolutely recommend to anyone who's looking for a steakhouse in New York to visit here.
Lovely restaurant on the west side of manhatton. The service was excellent and the quality of the food was very good.
As good as any steakhouse i have ever visited! Owned one at at at many of the best. Going again tonight.

Really great food & the T-bone is to die for, starters are very nice also. Little expensive but you get great food unlike applebee's in times square. Would advise anyone who loves steak to visit here & got some good bars close aswell.
One of the best steaks I've had. Great atmosphere and friendly staff. Yes a little pricy but worth it.
Food was really good here. Service was also very good. Drinks were just so so. I did like this restaurant but there are better choices for the price you pay. Decent atmosphere and clean.
A little off the beaten track, this was worth the effort. Small restaurant with great steak.. Service good, and price more than reasonable for New York

Small neighborhood restaurant. Flight delayed and couldn't get in town and missed reservations at another restaurant do found this place on trip advisor. Steaks were decent, service and prices ok. Worked out well in our situation!

Wife & I ordered a couple of filet mignons here during our stay in NYC (it's a stone's throw away from The Yotel). Food was prepared as ordered and the service provided by the staff excellent. We would definitely choose to eat here again.
Good food, awesome atmosphere food was quick and reasonably priced food visited in fall, looks like a nice area to eat outside in the summer.
We had Steak shrimp potatoes veggies dessert the works UMM!! U can't go wrong with this restaurant close to everything and the staff and the boss there r the best !! Cant wait to go back!!
Friendly staff, quick return on orders, and the steak is To. Die. For! We came back twice, could not stay away from those strip steaks...
Small, cramped little restaurant. I ordered the NY Strip steak, which was the best steak I have had in recent memory. The house Pinot Noir was superb.
Visited this restaurant early evening after a show.Food and service were great. You will get to know your "neighbors" however as the seating is extremely tight.
Chose this from tripadvisor ratings and totally justified. Service wasn't fast but the steaks were really excellent.

We can reccomend this steakhouse to anyone wanting a good steak in nice surroundings. The service was attentive ans the staff were friendly. Definitely in the top 3 places we ate at whist in New York.
The Burgers are very nice. The prices fair. Nice and friendly location. Online reservation possible... this is very important in NY.

Food was great. Service was quick and friendly. Great location just off the hustle and bustle of Times square. Would recommend. Sides not included with steak so don't forget to add on. These are upwards of $6.

column3: Can't tell you about the food, we never got served
column4: We were seated outside and the waiter came and served us water. He never came back! we waited for 25 minutes and left. The people across from us were eating but sent their food back so we figured we may as well hit the road.
Everything from the service to the quality of the food was excellent. Be sure to try the peppercorn sauce on the steak!

Just went there with my husband, we ordered crab cakes, beef steak and pork with risotto and 2 sodas. Service was ok - not bad but nothing extra either. Meat was really nicely done! Really tasty. Total bill was $90

Myself and my wife love a good steak and this did not disappoint! We shared the porterhouse, which was huge, cooked to perfection and was up there with some of the tastiest steak we've had! Highly recommended and pretty good value.
We stopped in here for lunch after a harbor cruise and were not disappointed. We both ordered off the lunch special and had 2 delicious meals with drinks for under $25.
Both steaks ordered were not cooked as requested and served cool. Service was average and rushed to order. Cocktails average.
I had the small filet - and it was prepared to perfection. The restaurant is small and quiet and relatively inexpensive for what I enjoyed.
The menu was typical of a steakhouse, with a combination of steaks, burgers, salads and house specials. My wife and I both had chicken dishes. These were delicious and arrived promptly.

column3: Very good ribs at reasonable ptice
column4: I went here with my family for dinner and we enjoyed it My son was looking for ribs and he got them. He said the best ever! The only defect we found were the lights, quite low

Caught up with a friend who suggested this restaurant in the Hells kitchen area. Had a couple of very nice steaks, both were cooked very well & full of flavour. Staff were friendly especially our waitress from Poland. Will visit again
Went after reading reviews in TripAdvisor. Food was great, and the service was fine. Will definitely go again.
Nice steakhouse, good food, average service. Good value for money here,; the service can be a bit indifferent.
Went tere for a dinner and ordered New York T-bone Steak. Perfectly served, friendly staff and reasonably priced.

As a couple we visited recently and chose steaks which were cooked to perfection! The only negative was waiting for our vegetables it seemed to be ages and the steak was going cold by the time it arrived!
we just stopped in for a couple apps. had crab cakes and scallops- both were excellent. $$ is misleading. steaks are $30 - $39.
Very nice place. Good service and excellent food. Got New York strip steak and onion soup - i was excited. Burger was a little bit worse than steak. Thank you!

about 10-15 min walk from Times Square but worth it. Steaks cooked to perfection, would order sides to share as portions quite big. Recommend booking as people were waiting for tables., worth the wait though.
graet steaks with very big of beer choice. service is very frendly and fast . the price is miduem but reasonable

After being away sailing for 2 months all I wanted was steak. The fillet mignon was perfectly cooked and tasty. My friends ribeye was also perfect. Service was friendly and fast but didn't feel rushed.

We are really glad we visit West Side Steakhouse, the food is excellent! We tried the Crab Cakes, Fried Calamaris as appetizers. The Filet Mignon and the Ribs as main entries. For desert we got the Molten. Excellent food and excellent service!
We went here on the basis of reviews on here and we were not disappointed. Our steaks were really good: succulent, lean and well cooked. Service good too. Not cheap but good value.
Good lunch with good service, a good selection of food, wine and beer. Catered well for our party of eight which included four young children.
Our last night in New York and this was just the place to spend it. Great atmosphere, good choice of food and very large portions. Excellent service.
Me and wife had launch. We ordered hotdog and the west burger. The hotdog was outstanding, while the burger was abit dry. The service was good and the prices were very reasonable.
A great local spot with amazing service and food quality. Portions are quite large and restaurant was well decorated for holidays.
A jem in the heart of hell's kitchen, service was great and the food even better. If you're a steak lover then this is the place for you, outstanding cuts of meat cooked just how you want it.
Nice small restaurant,good food and good service. The meat is well prepered, to your living. I Asko enjoyed the poe dessert.

Stopped by for dinner. The steak was good, the selection of beers was very good, the atmosphere was nice. Overall a very pleasant meal. One particular note. A blind couple ate next to us and I was very impressed how accommodating the staff were.

column3: Atmosphere ruined by the kitchen, otherwise good.
column4: The food and wine and service were all terrific. The food was especially delicious! Our only complaint is that you could hear very loud mariachi music emanating from the kitchen, which was really rather obnoxious.
